text: (Permitted vos est sexual intercourse tuus uxor nox de fasting They est keepers tuus secrets vos est keepers their secrets. DEUS knew VOS used betray TUUS ANIMA He redeemed VOS pardoned VOS! Henceforth vos habet intercourse them seeking quod DEUS permitted vos! Vos eat drink albus thread de light becomes distinguishable ex dark thread nox apud dawn Tunc vos fast sunset. Sexual intercourse prohibited vos decide retreat masjid ultimus 10 feria Ramadan)! These est deus juris; vos non transgress them. DEUS SIC clarifies His revelations people UT they attain salvation
